data.title: The Gods of Mars by Burroughs, Edgar Rice: Fine Hardcover (1918) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - A. C. McClurg & Co., Chicago - 1918 - Condition: Fine - Very Good - First Edition with "Published September, 1918" and "W. F. HALL PRINTING COMPANY, CHICAGO" on the copyright page; in original dust jacket with $1.35 price on spine. Publisher's original red cloth with the front and spine lettered in black, front cover also decorated in blind. Dust jacket and frontispiece by Frank E. Schoonover. Heins M2-1. Chicago: A. C. McClurg & Co. (September, 1918), 348 pps. A Fine square tight copy with modestly dust darkened top edge and front gutter. Original un-restored jacket with 1-2" splits along flap folds; a few other small tears or creases. From the "Astonishing Edgar Rice Burroughs collection" of Howard Frank. "Almost every copy in best available condition", in original jackets, many signed. - The Gods of Mars

Terms of Sale:

We guarantee the condition of every book as it's described on the Abebooks web sites. If you're dissatisfied with your purchase (Incorrect Book/Not as Described/Damaged) or if the order hasn't arrived, you're eligible for a refund within 30 days of the estimated delivery date. If you've changed your mind about a book that you've ordered, please use the Ask bookseller a question link to contact us and we'll respond within 2 business days.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 1 pound. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

We will combine purchases to save on shipping.
